attributes.action: Impose a new law that restricts the salary's politicians have.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A new law should be imposed that will limit the amount of money politicians get at this present point in time. This will ensure that only good people, and people who truely want to make a difference get through. A prime minister should be paid maximum of £45,000 pa, all his cabinet ministers should be paid a maximum of £30,000 pa, all other parties should be paid a maximum of £25,000 pa per head, if they want more money, they will need to show that they will truely make a difference to their country. Also bonuses will be eliminated all together.
